Plot: A young boy accidentally discovers a deep hole in the ground, where another boy is kept prisoner.
Title: I'm Not Scared
Writer: Niccolò Ammaniti (novel), Niccolò Ammaniti (screenplay), Francesca Marciano (screenplay)
Actors: Giuseppe Cristiano, Mattia Di Pierro, Adriana Conserva, Fabio Tetta
tomatoConsensus: A well-acted and thrilling coming-of-age tale that captures a child awakening to the frightening world of adults.
